ygData.subject: Re: Stop the presses
ygData.msgSnippet: Those aren t exactly the best stats for a druid, but I know a friend who forgot to put his bonus points into creating his half-elf druid (*cough* Athexx
ygData.messageBody:
Those aren't exactly the best stats for a druid,
but I know a friend who forgot to put his bonus
points into creating his half-elf druid (*cough* Athexx
*cough*) and did fine from levels 1-9. However, since a
druid is a spellcaster, the physical stats are of
neglegible importance except agility which determines how
often you get hit. A druid's mana comes from his wisdom
- the more wisdom a druid has, the more he/she can
cast.<br>Just my 2 cents, hope it helps =)<br><br> - Gilerrin
Galewind, retired Drunk of the 42nd rank
